item.title: Rideshare operations are being suspended in California
item.description: At 11:59PM PT today our rideshare operations in California will be suspended. This is not something we wanted to do, as we know millions of Californians depend on Lyft for daily, essential trips. We‚Äôre personally reaching out to riders and drivers to share more about why this is happening, what you can do about it, and to provide some transportation alternatives

item.title: First Side Project with Svelte...and Other Cool Stuff (Stripe, Netlify Identity, FaunaDB)
item.description:
Svelte is the hot new framework that you probably haven't tried yet. Well, Brad Garropy tried it out on a recent side project (along with FaunaDB, Netlify Identity, Stripe, and more) and is loving it! In this video, learn about Brad's experience and opinions working with Svelte and other cool tech: Netlify functions + Identity, FaunaDB, Stripe, and Tailwind CSS!
Murph Tracker Source Code - https://github.com/bradgarropy/murphee
Follow Brad YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/bradgarropy Twitter - https://twitter.com/bradgarropy Website - http://bradgarropy.com/

item.title: ASP.NET Core in Action, Second Edition
item.description: Fully updated to ASP.NET 3.1, ASP.NET Core in Action, Second Edition is a hands-on primer to building cross-platform web applications with your C# and .NET skills. Even if you‚Äôve never worked with ASP.NET you‚Äôll start creating productive cross-platform web apps fast. And don‚Äôt worry about late-breaking changes to ASP.NET Core. With this Manning Early Access Program edition you‚Äôll get updates right up until it ships to the printer, so you‚Äôre always working with the latest version of the technology.

item.title: Gurugram: Call centre dupes 30,000 Americans in three weeks by posting malware links
item.description: The Sohna Road call centre underscores the law and order challenge cyber police still face in the national capital region, which has been on the radar of international law enforcement agencies, including Americas FBI, since a large number of crook calls were traced to cities around Delhi, particularly Gurgaon and Noida. Over the past couple of years, several large call centres, primarily targeting American citizens, have been busted.
